mov r8, v0
add r9.w, r8.w, -r9.y
mad r8.x, r9.w, r9.x, r8.x

    abs r0.x, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r1, c4, s1
      add r0.y, -r1.y, r8.w
      mad r1.x, r1.x, r0.y, r8.x
      mov r1.yz, r8.xyww

      mov r1.xyz, c4.y

    add r0.y, c4.z, r8.z
    add r0.z, r0.y, c8.x
    log r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.z, r0.z, c8.y

    mul r0.w, r0.w, c8.x
    mad r0.z, r0.z, -c5.x, c5.y

    mul r0.z, r0.z, r0.w
    rcp r0.y, r0.y

    mov r2.yz, r8.xyww

    rcp r0.z, r0.z

    rcp r0.z, r8.w
    mul r0.zw, r0.z, r8.xyxy

    mul r1, r0.w, c18
